oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Addition of runs to an s-level supersaturated design
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: GUPTA, VK
CHATTERJEE, K
DAS, A
KOLE, B
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Supersaturated design
E(chi(2)) optimality criterion
Lower bound
CONSTRUCTION
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The purpose of the present work is to extend the work of Gupta et al. (2010) to s-level column balanced supersaturated designs. Addition of runs to an existing E(chi(2))-optimal supersaturated design and to study the optimality of the resulting design is an important issue. This paper considers the study of the optimality of the resulting design. A lower bound to E(chi(2)) has been obtained for the extended supersaturated designs. Some examples and a small catalogue of E(chi(2))-optimal supersaturated designs are also presented. (C) 2012 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF STATISTICAL PLANNING AND INFERENCE, 142(8)2402-2408
